last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kinga, Alicja and Zuzanna scramble to stay one step ahead of multiple gangsters, an informant, the entire police force — and each other.

name: The Green Glove Gang
overview: When their latest heist goes wrong, three older female burglars evade officials by hiding out in a nursing home — where they uncover a sinister secret.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Hiding and on the run, the Green Glove Gang is forced to resurface when one of their sons entangles with a fierce gangster, prompting a showdown.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While the police commissioner investigates a clue left at the site of a robbery, the three members of the Green Glove Gang go into hiding.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Officer Gujska searches for the owner of the tattoo. Zuzanna befriends her fellow residents and helps Josef with his sister's funeral.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The gang decides to teach the greedy funeral home director a lesson. The police track down the getaway car belonging to the suspects.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Kinga, Alicja and Zuzanna plan a heist to reclaim stolen possessions from a pawn shop. A witness comes forward with information that threatens the gang.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A gang of thieves steals a meteorite, leaving behind a green glove. Kinga, Alicja and Zuzanna decide to intervene when they discover Marzena's plot.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The Green Glove Gang tries to expose a famous healer defrauding the community. The police reach out to the public for help with the case.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Marzena goes to the police and snitches on Kinga, Alicja and Zuzanna. Officer Gujska sends an undercover operative to buy the meteorite.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Igor comes forward to help the commissioner. The nursing home residents work together to try and take down Marzena and her criminal enterprise.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When the life of Zuzanna's son is threatened by a ruthless mob boss, the Green Glove Gang is left with only one choice: planning an impossible heist.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Frustrated with the police commissioner, Gujska follows a lead on her own. The gang conducts reconnaissance for the heist with the help of Tomek.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The gang recruits a mysterious demolitions expert to help them infiltrate the art gallery. Marzena makes a deal for her release.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Zuzanna and Kinga ignore Alicja's premonitions and take down a corrupt dog shelter owner. The senior nightclub attracts unwanted attention.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Alicja stands up to Masarz. After a fruitless interrogation, Gujska plots to trick the police commissioner. Marzena sets a trap for the gang.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Tomek receives a tempting offer. Kinga suffers a bout of jealousy. Masarz decides to take out Alicja — on an extravagant date.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A familiar face shows up at the nightclub. When the gang discovers what Masarz is really after, they are forced to launch the heist early.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Kinga, Alicja and Zuzanna scramble to stay one step ahead of multiple gangsters, an informant, the entire police force — and each other.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Hiding and on the run, the Green Glove Gang is forced to resurface when one of their sons entangles with a fierce gangster, prompting a showdown.
